Type

Our responsive text sizing, each font size has its range of sizes with its own media queries.

Class Rule 
.font-size-display
 
.font-size-xxxl
 
.font-size-xxl
 
.font-size-xl
 
.font-size-lg
 
.font-size-md
 
.font-size-base
 
.font-size-sm
 
.font-size-xs
